ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $RecordType.Name = 'Sales Help Request Case', ISPICKVAL(Type,'DialSource Request'), NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,'System Admin')), NOT($Profile.Name = 'Paychex Marketing Admin'), ISNEW(), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Type__c,'Marketing DS DID Setup/Edit'))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have access to the Request Type/Sub-Type selected. Please reach out to your Sales Assistant or Super User if you have additional questions.
